AdvancedSchedule.description: The properties of the create Advanced Schedule.

monthDays.description: Days of the month that the job should execute on. Must be between 1 and 31.

monthlyOccurrences.description: Occurrences of days within a month.

weekDays.description: Days of the week that the job should execute on.

AdvancedScheduleMonthlyOccurrence.description: The properties of the create advanced schedule monthly occurrence.

day.description: Day of the occurrence. Must be one of monday, tuesday, wednesday, thursday, friday, saturday, sunday.

occurrence.description: Occurrence of the week within the month. Must be between 1 and 5

AutomationAccountCreateOrUpdatePropertie.description: The parameters supplied to the create or update account properties.

AzureQueryProperties.description: Azure query for the update configuration.

locations.description: List of locations to scope the query to.

scope.description: List of Subscription or Resource Group ARM Ids.

CertificateCreateOrUpdateProperties.description: The properties of the create certificate operation.

base64Value.description: Gets or sets the base64 encoded value of the certificate.

description.description: Gets or sets the description of the certificate.

isExportable.description: Gets or sets the is exportable flag of the certificate.

thumbprint.description: Gets or sets the thumbprint of the certificate.

ConnectionCreateOrUpdateProperties.description: The properties of the create connection properties

connectionType.description: Gets or sets the connectionType of the connection.

description.description: Gets or sets the description of the connection.

fieldDefinitionValues.description: Gets or sets the field definition properties of the connection.

ConnectionTypeAssociationProperty.description: The connection type property associated with the entity.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the connection type.

ConnectionTypeCreateOrUpdateProperties.description: The properties of the create connection type.

fieldDefinitions.description: Gets or sets the field definitions of the connection type.

isGlobal.description: Gets or sets a Boolean value to indicate if the connection type is global.

ContentHash.description: Definition of the runbook property type.

algorithm.description: Gets or sets the content hash algorithm used to hash the content.

value.description: Gets or sets expected hash value of the content.

uri.description: Gets or sets the uri of the runbook content.

version.description: Gets or sets the version of the content.

type.description: Gets or sets the content source type.

value.description: Gets or sets the value of the content. This is based on the content source type.

version.description: Gets or sets the version of the content.

CredentialCreateOrUpdateProperties.description: The properties of the create credential operation.

description.description: Gets or sets the description of the credential.

password.description: Gets or sets the password of the credential.

userName.description: Gets or sets the user name of the credential.

DscCompilationJobCreateProperties.description: The parameters supplied to the create compilation job operation.

incrementNodeConfigurationBuild.description: If a new build version of NodeConfiguration is required.

parameters.description: Gets or sets the parameters of the job.

DscConfigurationAssociationProperty.description: The Dsc configuration property associated with the entity.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the Dsc configuration.

DscConfigurationCreateOrUpdateProperties.description: The properties to create or update configuration.

description.description: Gets or sets the description of the configuration.

logProgress.description: Gets or sets progress log option.

logVerbose.description: Gets or sets verbose log option.

parameters.description: Gets or sets the configuration parameters.

DscConfigurationParameter.description: Definition of the configuration parameter type.

defaultValue.description: Gets or sets the default value of parameter.

isMandatory.description: Gets or sets a Boolean value to indicate whether the parameter is mandatory or not.

position.description: Get or sets the position of the parameter.

type.description: Gets or sets the type of the parameter.

DscNodeConfigurationCreateOrUpdateParame.description: The parameter properties supplied to the create or update node configuration operation.

configuration.description: Gets or sets the configuration of the node.

incrementNodeConfigurationBuild.description: If a new build version of NodeConfiguration is required.

ErrorResponse.description: Error response of an operation failure

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

isEncrypted.description: Gets or sets the isEncrypted flag of the connection field definition.

isOptional.description: Gets or sets the isOptional flag of the connection field definition.

type.description: Gets or sets the type of the connection field definition.

parameters.description: Gets or sets the parameters of the job.

runOn.description: Gets or sets the runOn which specifies the group name where the job is to be executed.

JobScheduleCreateProperties.description: The parameters supplied to the create job schedule operation.

parameters.description: Gets or sets a list of job properties.

runOn.description: Gets or sets the hybrid worker group that the scheduled job should run on.

excludedPackageNameMasks.description: packages excluded from the software update configuration.

includedPackageClassifications.description: Update classifications included in the software update configuration.

includedPackageNameMasks.description: packages included from the software update configuration.

rebootSetting.description: Reboot setting for the software update configuration.

ModuleCreateOrUpdateProperties.description: The parameters supplied to the create or update module properties.

contentLink.description: Gets or sets the module content link.

NonAzureQueryProperties.description: Non Azure query for the update configuration.

workspaceId.description: Workspace Id for Log Analytics in which the saved Search is resided.

PythonPackageCreateProperties.description: The parameters supplied to the create or update module properties.

contentLink.description: Gets or sets the module content link.

RunbookAssociationProperty.description: The runbook property associated with the entity.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the runbook.

RunbookCreateOrUpdateProperties.description: The parameters supplied to the create or update runbook properties.

description.description: Gets or sets the description of the runbook.

draft.description: Gets or sets the draft runbook properties.

logActivityTrace.description: Gets or sets the activity-level tracing options of the runbook.

logProgress.description: Gets or sets progress log option.

logVerbose.description: Gets or sets verbose log option.

publishContentLink.description: Gets or sets the published runbook content link.

runbookType.description: Gets or sets the type of the runbook.

creationTime.description: Gets or sets the creation time of the runbook draft.

draftContentLink.description: Gets or sets the draft runbook content link.

inEdit.description: Gets or sets whether runbook is in edit mode.

lastModifiedTime.description: Gets or sets the last modified time of the runbook draft.

outputTypes.description: Gets or sets the runbook output types.

parameters.description: Gets or sets the runbook draft parameters.

RunbookParameter.description: Definition of the runbook parameter type.

defaultValue.description: Gets or sets the default value of parameter.

isMandatory.description: Gets or sets a Boolean value to indicate whether the parameter is mandatory or not.

position.description: Get or sets the position of the parameter.

type.description: Gets or sets the type of the parameter.

advancedSchedule.description: Gets or sets the advanced schedule.

creationTime.description: Gets or sets the creation time.

expiryTime.description: Gets or sets the end time of the schedule.

expiryTimeOffsetMinutes.description: Gets or sets the expiry time's offset in minutes.

frequency.description: Gets or sets the frequency of the schedule.

interval.description: Gets or sets the interval of the schedule.

isEnabled.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this schedule is enabled.

lastModifiedTime.description: Gets or sets the last modified time.

nextRun.description: Gets or sets the next run time of the schedule.

nextRunOffsetMinutes.description: Gets or sets the next run time's offset in minutes.

startTime.description: Gets or sets the start time of the schedule.

timeZone.description: Gets or sets the time zone of the schedule.

ScheduleAssociationProperty.description: The schedule property associated with the entity.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the Schedule.

ScheduleCreateOrUpdateProperties.description: The parameters supplied to the create or update schedule operation.

description.description: Gets or sets the description of the schedule.

expiryTime.description: Gets or sets the end time of the schedule.

frequency.description: Gets or sets the frequency of the schedule.

interval.description: Gets or sets the interval of the schedule.

startTime.description: Gets or sets the start time of the schedule.

timeZone.description: Gets or sets the time zone of the schedule.

capacity.description: Gets or sets the SKU capacity.

family.description: Gets or sets the SKU family.

name.description: Gets or sets the SKU name of the account.

scheduleInfo.description: Schedule information for the Software update configuration

tasks.description: Tasks information for the Software update configuration.

updateConfiguration.description: update specific properties for the Software update configuration

SoftwareUpdateConfigurationTasks.description: Task properties of the software update configuration.

SourceControlCreateOrUpdateProperties.description: The properties of the create source control operation.

autoSync.description: The auto async of the source control. Default is false.

branch.description: The repo branch of the source control. Include branch as empty string for VsoTfvc.

description.description: The user description of the source control.

folderPath.description: The folder path of the source control. Path must be relative.

publishRunbook.description: The auto publish of the source control. Default is true.

repoUrl.description: The repo url of the source control.

securityToken.description: The authorization token for the repo of the source control.

sourceType.description: The source type. Must be one of VsoGit, VsoTfvc, GitHub, case sensitive.

tokenType.description: The token type. Must be either PersonalAccessToken or Oauth.

SourceControlSyncJobCreateProperties.description: Definition of create source control sync job properties.

commitId.description: The commit id of the source control sync job. If not syncing to a commitId, enter an empty string.

TagSettingsProperties.description: Tag filter information for the VM.

filterOperator.description: Filter VMs by Any or All specified tags.

tags.description: Dictionary of tags with its list of values.

TargetProperties.description: Group specific to the update configuration.

azureQueries.description: List of Azure queries in the software update configuration.

nonAzureQueries.description: List of non Azure queries in the software update configuration.

TaskProperties.description: Task properties of the software update configuration.

parameters.description: Gets or sets the parameters of the task.

source.description: Gets or sets the name of the runbook.

UpdateConfiguration.description: Update specific properties of the software update configuration.

azureVirtualMachines.description: List of azure resource Ids for azure virtual machines targeted by the software update configuration.

duration.description: Maximum time allowed for the software update configuration run. Duration needs to be specified using the format PT[n]H[n]M[n]S as per ISO8601

nonAzureComputerNames.description: List of names of non-azure machines targeted by the software update configuration.

targets.description: Group targets for the software update configuration.

VariableCreateOrUpdateProperties.description: The properties of the create variable operation.

description.description: Gets or sets the description of the variable.

isEncrypted.description: Gets or sets the encrypted flag of the variable.

value.description: Gets or sets the value of the variable.

executionFrequencyInSeconds.description: Gets or sets the frequency at which the watcher is invoked.

scriptName.description: Gets or sets the name of the script the watcher is attached to, i.e. the name of an existing runbook.

scriptParameters.description: Gets or sets the parameters of the script.

scriptRunOn.description: Gets or sets the name of the hybrid worker group the watcher will run on.

excludedKbNumbers.description: KB numbers excluded from the software update configuration.

includedKbNumbers.description: KB numbers included from the software update configuration.

includedUpdateClassifications.description: Update classification included in the software update configuration. A comma separated string with required values

rebootSetting.description: Reboot setting for the software update configuration.
